Chapman University
Office of Admission


Undergraduate Admission


Graduate Admission




‹


›






















Chapman offers more than 120 undergraduate and 40 graduate areas of study―as well as countless ways to personalize your education.
Our university is a vibrant community located across two campuses in the heart of Orange County, California. Our Office of Admission will help you explore all the possibilities!













Undergraduate Admission

Learn more about Chapman and applying as a first-year or transfer student.


Visit Undergraduate AdmissionÂ 













 Graduate Admission

We offer more than 40 in-person graduate and credential programs that help you advance your career or change professions. 


Graduate AdmissionÂ 








Find Your Program
Use our program finder to discover all the possibilities. 


Explore Programs





Take a Self-guided Virtual Tour
Virtually explore Chapman in this tour through our Orange Campus. You'll be able to visit classrooms, hang-out spots, our residence life area and much more!
About Chapman University







Visit Chapman
The best way to get to know Chapman is to visit―in person or virtually. View all opportunities for undergraduate and graduate programs.
 Undergraduate Admission   Graduate Admission 







Contact Us

Have questions about Chapman or the application process? We’re happy to help! Contact our office: 



  (714) 997 - 6711
  admit@chapman.edu
